# Combined Features {data-stack-name="Combined"}

## Full Example

This code block has both fullscreen and line highlighting:

```{.javascript code-line-numbers="1-3|5-10|12-16"}
// Configuration
const config = {
  apiKey: process.env.API_KEY,
};

// Async data fetching
async function fetchData(endpoint) {
  const response = await fetch(endpoint);
  const data = await response.json();
  return data;
}

// Main execution
fetchData('/api/users')
  .then(users => console.log(users))
  .catch(err => console.error(err));
```
